name: votebeats
description: VoteBeats - DJ song request and voting platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix desktop-helper install
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "server,client" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan" "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client start"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
